posts.post_content:
Hey folks,

I'm looking to buy a large or semi-large collection of cards. A little over 5 years ago, I did the same thing, buying roughly 1 million cards from a collector on here with a lot of success (mostly modern cards though). It was a ton of fun to go through and make sets, keep stuff I needed, trade stuff to members of my online trading groups, let my daughters share in the rummaging and collecting, and sell some of it to regain some cash. Well, I only have about 30% of that collection left and most of it is dry bones now, so I'm looking to do something similar.

A list of ideas of stuff I'd be looking for:
- a dealer's collection of cards 
- complete sets or large starters (vintage)
- large bulk lots
- HOFers
- graded and ungraded
- prewar 
- looking to buy in bulk...not buying singles
- Play Ball, Topps, Goudey, T-sets, E-sets, etc

I'm really open to just about anything though. TRY ME!!! I just don't want to restock with stuff I already have and a lot of late '80s/early '90s stuff. 

Please PM me with ideas. If I can't afford the lot, I've got a buddy who likely can. Thanks!

Jimi
[url]jimivintage@yahoo.com[/url]

Worth a shot!  I miss my e98 set!  ;)

Jimi
